name: Another Spy Game
description:
Submitted to Historically Accurate Game Jam.

Another Spy Game is a story driven 2D pixel art game based on Cold War Espionage.

Description:

Spies during the Cold War were responsible for gathering critical data, conducting assassinations and surveillance. Two such British spies were doing their usual work in Russia.  But something went terribly wrong.

🕒The game runs for 10 - 15 minutes.

Till now it only has an English version. 

How to play: 

Use AD/ ⬅️➡️ to move

Use 🖱️ to interact

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/pixellium-font-f30306
